amendment.description: Amendment allows for special priority to be given for awarding Byrne discretionary grants to public agencies that have proposed or implemented strategies that provide for cooperation between law enforcement agencies to disrupt the illegal sale or transfer of firearms to or between juveniles by tracing the sources of guns.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to give special priority in distributing Byrne Discretionary Grants to public agencies that have proposed or implemented programs that have developed cooperative efforts between local, state, and federal law enforcement authorities to disrupt illegal gun sales to minors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meehan amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
